\forall \, (w, z) \in A^2, \, 
  \exists \, \gamma \in C^0([0,1], A), \,
  \gamma(0) = w \, \mbox{ and } \, \gamma(1) = z.
B = \bigcup_{a \in A} D(a, r_a) \; \mbox{ and } \; \forall \, a \in A, \, r_a > 0.

\forall \, a \in A, \; \exists \, \epsilon > 0, \;
  \forall \, b \in A, \; |b-a| < \epsilon \, \Rightarrow \, f(b) = f(a).
